main event: A stationary light was observed in Chantilly, Virginia on April 18, 1963. The light disappeared after brief flashes, reappeared flashing brightly, and then disappeared behind trees after 2 minutes.
interesting points: The object was described as a stationary light that would flash briefly and then disappear.
The object reappeared flashing brightly before disappearing behind trees.
The sighting lasted for about 2 minutes with no sound reported.
The object was believed to be related to a flight simulation based on previous air defense and radar cases.
The object was described as probably being a flight simulation.
result: probably related to a flight simulation
